name: Combo Pack Sea Turtle Hat Patter
description:
Aren't Sea Turtles the cutest thing on earth. Well this one sure is, especially with those big eyes. and groovy flowers on his shell.
This pattern is for sizes 3-6 months, 6-12 months, and Toddler (12 mo-3yrs) Chilren/preteen, Teen/Adult 

Worsted weight yarn in Light Green 
Worsted weight yarn in Dark Brown, Black, White, 
Sports weight in Yellow, Orange and Red 
Worsted weight yarn in Light Brown 
Size H/8 5.00 MM hook 
Size I/9 5.50 MM hook 
Size J/10 6.00 MM hook 
stitch marker, 
Darning needle 
scissors 
Small amount of stuffing 

This pattern is written is US terms. If you have any questions about this pattern please email me at hats_and_what_knots [!at] yahoo.com
I will email you the pattern within 24 hours of payment, if you have not received your pattern after 24 hours please check your spam folder, if you still have not received it please contact me at hats_and_what_knots [!at] yahoo.com

Due to the nature of the sale, there will be no refunds. 

This is for a PDF file not finished product. If you want to order a finished product please see my website www.hatsandwhatknots.com or fine me on facebook at www.facebook.com/HatsandWhatKnots

name: Pattern Adjustable Cocoon Photography Prop
description:
Photographers are you tired of using one photography prop for a blanket and another photography prop to cocoon the baby in? Well now you can crochet my Adjustable Cocoon Photography Prop. This cute photography prop can be adjusted to fit the tiniest of newborns, to infant. 

My son was almost an ounce shy of 9 lbs when he was born, and those tiny photography props don't always fit newborns. So I came up with this neat idea to have an adjustable cocoon. Not only can it be used as a cocoon you can lay it down and use it as a blanket as well. 

Here is a You Tube video of the actual photography prop. 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l9-9u4TEKgM&feature=g-upl

This is such a versatile photography prop you will sure fall in love with it.

This pattern is written is US terms. If you have any questions about this pattern please email me at hats_and_what_knots [!at] yahoo.com
I will email you the pattern within 24 hours of payment, if you have not received your pattern after 24 hours please check your spam folder, if you still have not received it please contact me at hats_and_what_knots [!at] yahoo.com

Due to the nature of the sale, there will be no refunds. 

This is for a PDF file not finished product. If you want to order a finished product please see my website www.hatsandwhatknots.com or fine me on facebook at www.facebook.com/HatsandWhatKnots

name: Patter Monkey Suite with Detachable Tail
description:
I kept seeing so many cute monkey outfits, but none for a pattern for detachable tail. So I decided to try and see what I could do. 

You can make this in a two tone, or just one color, I have both options 
This cute little set will go great with the Adjustable Cocoon Photography Prop. 

If you have any questions about the pattern feel free to email me.

Worsted Weight Yarn 
Size H/5.00 MM, I/5.50 MM, and J/6.00 MM hook 
Stitch marker 
scissors 
3 buttons 
8-10:12" pipe cleaners 
small amount of stuffing 

This pattern is written is US terms. If you have any questions about this pattern please email me at hats_and_what_knots [!at] yahoo.com
I will email you the pattern within 24 hours of payment, if you have not received your pattern after 24 hours please check your spam folder, if you still have not received it please contact me at hats_and_what_knots [!at] yahoo.com

Due to the nature of the sale, there will be no refunds. 

This is for a PDF file not finished product. If you want to order a finished product please see my website www.hatsandwhatknots.com or fine me on facebook at www.facebook.com/HatsandWhatKnots


You have my permission to sale finished products, please give me credit for pattern and design.
